publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3390 Mr Adam Ingram: Scottish Mental Health Week 7-13 October 2002â€”That the Parliament recognises and celebrates Scottish Mental Health Week 2002; welcomes the various initiatives taking place during this time including the performance by the 7:84 Theatre Company in the Parliament on 10 October 2002, and further welcomes the on-going work carried out by national organisations and the invaluable dedicated support network of local voluntary organisations in their struggle to provide adequate services and to combat the stigma attached to mental illness.
S1M-3390 Scottish Mental Health Week 7-13 October 2002 (lodged on 13 September 2002) Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-3390 Scottish Mental Health Week 7-13 October 2002 (lodged on 13 September 2002) David Mundell*
S1M-3390 Scottish Mental Health Week 7-13 October 2002 (lodged on 13 September 2002) Alex Neil*, Andrew Wilson*

S1M-3390 Scottish Mental Health Week 7-13 October 2002 (lodged on 13 September 2002) Scott Barrie*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Gil Paterson*
